short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time tracker that automatically determines which client you're working for, and makes sure you track your time for them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:

The Paydirt Chrome Extension lets you track your time from any web page or web app. Paydirt will track time wherever your work takes you, with intelligent reminders right on the page, so that you never forget to track time for a client again.

Paydirt has helped freelancers and teams get paid for over 300,000 hours of billable time with intelligent time tracking, easy invoicing & online payments, and business reports, with all of your billable time stored in your Paydirt account.  

The Paydirt Time Tracker Extension is free and available for all Paydirt customers.

Features:

* One click time tracking - Start a timer from any webpage with one click.  
* Catch up on lost time - Ever forget to start a timer?  Paydirt lets you start a timer up to 60 minutes in the past.
* Intelligent reminders - Paydirt determines who you’re working for and automatically adds a link to start a timer right on the page.
* Users of Basecamp, Trello, and Redbooth  will see the option to add a time log or start a timer from directly within individual tasks or todos, without ever leaving the page.
* Forget to log a time entry? Paydirt allows you to manually log time.
* Ever forget to stop a timer?  We’ve got you covered with forgotten timer reminders.
* Review and analyze tracked time at https://app.paydirtapp.com/reports
* Convert logged time directly into an invoice and send to your clients at https://app.paydirtapp.com/clients

How does it work?

Once you've installed the extension and set up some keywords, you're ready to track your time from anywhere. Paydirt scans the pages you visit for your clients’ keywords.  When it finds one, it prompts you to start a timer for the matching client.  There’s no code to install or integrations to set up - it just works.

What are keywords?

Keywords are unique words related to each client - like their business name, website address, or email address.  It’s up to you!  To get the most intelligent reminders, be sure to add a few good keywords for each of your clients.  

Where does it work?

Paydirt lets you track your time from any web page or web app.

Additional Information

To learn more about how the Paydirt extension can help you stay on top of your time tracking game, check us out at https://paydirtapp.com/time-tracking

We respect your privacy - no browsing data ever leaves your computer.

If you have any questions or feedback,  please reach out to us at talk@paydirtapp.com.
